description: This course is a broad introduction to advanced issues in compilers and run-time systems for several classes of programming languages, including imperative, object-oriented, and functional. Particular attention is paid to the structures, analyses, and transformations used in program optimization.
name: PROG LANG IMPLEMENTATION

values.comments:
Students found the class to be extremely interesting and well organized. They found Professor Lewis to be extremely engaging and energetic. They thought that they would definitely use the subject matter in future classes or jobs.
*Note: Less than 25% of students submitted written evaluations for this class
